016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import io.methvin.watcher.DirectoryChangeEvent;
019import io.methvin.watcher.DirectoryWatcher;
020import io.micronaut.maven.aot.AotAnalysisMojo;
021import io.micronaut.maven.services.CompilerService;
022import io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService;
023import io.micronaut.maven.services.ExecutorService;
024import io.micronaut.maven.testresources.AbstractTestResourcesMojo;
025import io.micronaut.maven.testresources.TestResourcesHelper;
026import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.ServerSettings;
027import io.micronaut.testresources.buildtools.ServerUtils;
028import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
029import org.apache.maven.model.FileSet;
030import org.apache.maven.plugin.BuildPluginManager;
031import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
032import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Execute;
033import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.LifecyclePhase;
034import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
035import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
036import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.ResolutionScope;
037import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
038import org.apache.maven.project.ProjectBuilder;
039import org.apache.maven.project.ProjectBuildingException;
040import org.apache.maven.project.ProjectBuildingRequest;
041import org.apache.maven.project.ProjectBuildingResult;
042import org.apache.maven.toolchain.ToolchainManager;
043import org.codehaus.plexus.util.AbstractScanner;
044import org.codehaus.plexus.util.cli.CommandLineUtils;
045import org.eclipse.aether.graph.Dependency;
046import org.eclipse.aether.util.artifact.JavaScopes;
047
048import javax.inject.Inject;
049import java.io.File;
050import java.nio.file.Files;
051import java.nio.file.InvalidPathException;
052import java.nio.file.Path;
053import java.util.ArrayList;
054import java.util.Arrays;
055import java.util.Collections;
056import java.util.List;
057import java.util.Optional;
058import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
059import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
060
061import static io.micronaut.maven.MojoUtils.findJavaExecutable;
062import static java.nio.file.Files.isDirectory;
063import static java.nio.file.Files.isReadable;
064import static java.nio.file.LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS;
065
066/**
067 * <p>Executes a Micronaut application in development mode.</p>
068 *
069 * <p>It watches for changes in the project tree. If there are changes in the {@code pom.xml} file, dependencies will be reloaded. If
070 * the changes are anywhere underneath {@code src/main}, it will recompile the project and restart the application.</p>
071 *
072 * <p>The plugin can handle changes in all the languages supported by Micronaut: Java, Kotlin and Groovy.</p>
073 *
074 * @author √Ålvaro S√°nchez-Mariscal
075 * @since 1.0.0
076 */
077@SuppressWarnings("unused")
078@Mojo(name = "run", requiresDependencyResolution = ResolutionScope.COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME, defaultPhase = LifecyclePhase.PREPARE_PACKAGE, aggregator = true)
079@Execute(phase = LifecyclePhase.PROCESS_CLASSES)
080public class RunMojo extends AbstractTestResourcesMojo {
081
082    public static final String MN_APP_ARGS = "mn.appArgs";
083    public static final String EXEC_MAIN_CLASS = "${exec.mainClass}";
084    public static final String RESOURCES_DIR = "src/main/resources";
085    public static final String THIS_PLUGIN = "io.micronaut.maven:micronaut-maven-plugin";
086
087    private static final List<String> RELEVANT_SRC_DIRS = List.of("resources", "java", "kotlin", "groovy");
088    private static final int LAST_COMPILATION_THRESHOLD = 500;
089    private static final List<String> DEFAULT_EXCLUDES;
090
091    static {
092        DEFAULT_EXCLUDES = new ArrayList<>();
093        Collections.addAll(DEFAULT_EXCLUDES, AbstractScanner.DEFAULTEXCLUDES);
094        Collections.addAll(DEFAULT_EXCLUDES, "**/.idea/**", "**/src/test/**");
095    }
096
097    private final MavenSession mavenSession;
098    private final ProjectBuilder projectBuilder;
099    private final ToolchainManager toolchainManager;
100    private final String javaExecutable;
101    private final DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService;
102    private final CompilerService compilerService;
103    private final ExecutorService executorService;
104
105    /**
106     * The project's target directory.
107     */
108    private final File targetDirectory;
109
110    /**
111     * The main class of the application, as defined in the
112     * <a href="https://www.mojohaus.org/exec-maven-plugin/java-mojo.html#mainClass">Exec Maven Plugin</a>.
113     */
114    @Parameter(defaultValue = EXEC_MAIN_CLASS, required = true)
115    private String mainClass;
116
117    /**
118     * Whether to start the Micronaut application in debug mode.
119     */
120    @Parameter(property = "mn.debug", defaultValue = "false")
121    private boolean debug;
122
123    /**
124     * Whether to suspend the execution of the application when running in debug mode.
125     */
126    @Parameter(property = "mn.debug.suspend", defaultValue = "false")
127    private boolean debugSuspend;
128
129    /**
130     * The port where remote debuggers can be attached to.
131     */
132    @Parameter(property = "mn.debug.port", defaultValue = "5005")
133    private int debugPort;
134
135    /**
136     * The host where remote debuggers can connect.
137     */
138    @Parameter(property = "mn.debug.host", defaultValue = "127.0.0.1")
139    private String debugHost;
140
141    /**
142     * List of inclusion/exclusion paths that should not trigger an application restart.
143     * For example, you can exclude a particular directory from being watched by adding the following
144     * configuration:
145     * <pre>
146     *     &lt;watches&gt;
147     *         &lt;watch&gt;
148     *             &lt;directory&gt;.some-dir&lt;/directory&gt;
149     *             &lt;excludes&gt;
150     *                 &lt;exclude&gt;**&#47;*&lt;/exclude&gt;
151     *             &lt;/excludes&gt;
152     *         &lt;/watch&gt;
153     *     &lt;/watches&gt;
154     * </pre>
155     * Check the
156     * <a href="https://maven.apache.org/ref/3.3.9/maven-model/apidocs/org/apache/maven/model/FileSet.html">FileSet</a>
157     * documentation for more details.
158     *
159     * @see <a href="https://maven.apache.org/ref/3.3.9/maven-model/apidocs/org/apache/maven/model/FileSet.html">FileSet</a>
160     */
161    @Parameter
162    private List<FileSet> watches;
163
164    /**
165     * <p>List of additional arguments that will be passed to the JVM process, such as Java agent properties.</p>
166     *
167     * <p>When using the command line, user properties will be passed through, eg: <code>mnv mn:run -Dmicronaut.environments=dev</code>.</p>
168     */
169    @Parameter(property = "mn.jvmArgs")
170    private String jvmArguments;
171
172    /**
173     * List of additional arguments that will be passed to the application, after the class name.
174     */
175    @Parameter(property = MN_APP_ARGS)
176    private String appArguments;
177
178    /**
179     * Whether to watch for changes, or finish the execution after the first run.
180     */
181    @Parameter(property = "mn.watch", defaultValue = "true")
182    private boolean watchForChanges;
183
184    /**
185     * Whether to enable or disable Micronaut AOT.
186     */
187    @Parameter(property = "micronaut.aot.enabled", defaultValue = "false")
188    private boolean aotEnabled;
189
190    // These 2 flags are used in the context of watching for changes
191    // the first one makes sure that only one recompilation is processed at a time
192    private final AtomicBoolean recompileRequested = new AtomicBoolean();
193    // the second one makes sure that we wait for the server to be started before we restart it
194    // otherwise a process may be kept alive
195    private final ReentrantLock restartLock = new ReentrantLock();
196
197    private MavenProject runnableProject;
198    private DirectoryWatcher directoryWatcher;
199    private volatile Process process;
200    private String classpath;
201    private int classpathHash;
202    private long lastCompilation;
203    private TestResourcesHelper testResourcesHelper;
204
205    @SuppressWarnings("CdiInjectionPointsInspection")
206    @Inject
207    public RunMojo(MavenSession mavenSession,
208                   BuildPluginManager pluginManager,
209                   ProjectBuilder projectBuilder,
210                   ToolchainManager toolchainManager,
211                   CompilerService compilerService,
212                   ExecutorService executorService,
213                   DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService) {
214        this.runnableProject = compilerService.findRunnableProject();
215        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
216        this.projectBuilder = projectBuilder;
217        this.toolchainManager = toolchainManager;
218        this.compilerService = compilerService;
219        this.executorService = executorService;
220        this.javaExecutable = findJavaExecutable(toolchainManager, mavenSession);
221        this.dependencyResolutionService = dependencyResolutionService;
222        this.targetDirectory = new File(runnableProject.getBuild().getDirectory());
223    }
224
225    @Override
226    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
227        testResourcesHelper = new TestResourcesHelper(testResourcesEnabled,
228            shared,
229            buildDirectory,
230            explicitPort,
231            clientTimeout,
232            serverIdleTimeoutMinutes,
233            runnableProject,
234            mavenSession,
235            dependencyResolutionService,
236            toolchainManager,
237            testResourcesVersion,
238            classpathInference,
239            testResourcesDependencies,
240            sharedServerNamespace,
241            debugServer);
242        initialize();
243
244        try {
245            maybeStartTestResourcesServer();
246            runApplication();
247            Thread shutdownHook = new Thread(this::killProcess);
248            Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(shutdownHook);
249
250            if (process != null && process.isAlive()) {
251                if (watchForChanges) {
252                    List<Path> pathsToWatch = new ArrayList<>();
253                    for (FileSet fs : watches) {
254                        var directory = runnableProject.getBasedir().toPath().resolve(fs.getDirectory()).toAbsolutePath();
255                        if (Files.exists(directory)) {
256                            pathsToWatch.add(directory);
257                            //If neither includes nor excludes, add a default include
258                            if ((fs.getIncludes() == null || fs.getIncludes().isEmpty()) && (fs.getExcludes() == null || fs.getExcludes().isEmpty())) {
259                                fs.addInclude("**/*");
260                            }
261                        }
262                    }
263
264                    this.directoryWatcher = DirectoryWatcher
265                        .builder()
266                        .paths(pathsToWatch)
267                        .listener(this::handleEvent)
268                        .build();
269
270                    // We use the working directory as the root path, because
271                    // the top-level project information may not be what we
272                    // expect, in particular if we run from a submodule, or
273                    // that we run from root but with the "-pl" option.
274                    // We can safely do this because it's only used to display
275                    // information about paths being watched to the user, the
276                    // actual paths are unchanged.
277                    Path root = Path.of(".").toAbsolutePath();
278                    List<Path> pathList = pathsToWatch.stream()
279                        .map(root::relativize)
280                        .filter(s -> !s.toString().isEmpty())
281                        .filter(Files::exists)
282                        .sorted()
283                        .toList();
284                    getLog().info("üëÄ Watching for changes in " + pathList);
285                    this.directoryWatcher.watch();
286                } else if (process != null && process.isAlive()) {
287                    process.waitFor();
288                }
289            }
290        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
291            Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
292        } catch (Exception e) {
293            if (getLog().isDebugEnabled()) {
294                getLog().debug("Exception while watching for changes", e);
295            }
296            throw new MojoExecutionException("Exception while watching for changes", e);
297        } finally {
298            killProcess();
299            cleanup();
300        }
301    }
302
303    protected final void initialize() {
304        resolveDependencies();
305        if (watches == null) {
306            watches = new ArrayList<>();
307        }
308        // watch pom.xml file changes
309        mavenSession.getAllProjects()
310            .stream()
311            .map(MavenProject::getBasedir)
312            .map(File::toPath)
313            .forEach(path -> {
314                var fileSet = new FileSet();
315                fileSet.setDirectory(path.toString());
316                fileSet.addInclude("pom.xml");
317                watches.add(fileSet);
318            });
319        // Add the default watch paths
320        mavenSession.getAllProjects()
321            .stream()
322            .flatMap(p -> {
323                var basedir = p.getBasedir().toPath();
324                return RELEVANT_SRC_DIRS.stream().map(dir -> basedir.resolve("src/main/" + dir));
325            })
326            .forEach(path -> {
327                var fileSet = new FileSet();
328                fileSet.setDirectory(path.toString());
329                fileSet.addInclude("**/*");
330                watches.add(fileSet);
331            });
332    }
333
334    protected final void setWatches(List<FileSet> watches) {
335        this.watches = watches;
336    }
337
338    final void handleEvent(DirectoryChangeEvent event) {
339        Path path = event.path();
340        Path parent = path.getParent();
341        Path projectRootDirectory = mavenSession.getTopLevelProject().getBasedir().toPath();
342
343        if (matches(path)) {
344            if (getLog().isInfoEnabled()) {
345                getLog().info(String.format("üìù Detected change in %s. Recompiling/restarting...", projectRootDirectory.relativize(path)));
346            }
347            boolean compiledOk = compileProject();
348            if (compiledOk) {
349                try {
350                    runApplication();
351                } catch (Exception e) {
352                    getLog().error("Unable to run application: " + e.getMessage(), e);
353                }
354            }
355        }
356    }
357
358    private boolean matches(Path path) {
359        // Apply default exclusions
360        if (isDefaultExcluded(path) || isDirectory(path, NOFOLLOW_LINKS) || !isReadable(path) || hasBeenCompiledRecently()) {
361            return false;
362        }
363
364        Path projectRootDirectory = mavenSession.getTopLevelProject().getBasedir().toPath();
365
366        String relativePath = projectRootDirectory.relativize(path).toString();
367
368        boolean matches = false;
369        for (FileSet fileSet : watches) {
370            if (fileSet.getIncludes() != null && !fileSet.getIncludes().isEmpty()) {
371                File directory = new File(fileSet.getDirectory());
372                if (directory.exists() && path.getParent().startsWith(directory.getAbsolutePath())) {
373                    for (String includePattern : fileSet.getIncludes()) {
374                        if (pathMatches(includePattern, path) || patternEquals(path, includePattern, directory)) {
375                            matches = true;
376                            if (getLog().isDebugEnabled()) {
377                                getLog().debug("Path [" + relativePath + "] matched the include pattern [" + includePattern + "] of the directory [" + fileSet.getDirectory() + "]");
378                            }
379                            break;
380                        }
381                    }
382                }
383            }
384            if (matches) {
385                break;
386            }
387        }
388
389        // Finally, process excludes only if the path is matching
390        if (matches) {
391            for (FileSet fileSet : watches) {
392                if (fileSet.getExcludes() != null && !fileSet.getExcludes().isEmpty()) {
393                    File directory = new File(fileSet.getDirectory());
394                    if (directory.exists() && path.getParent().startsWith(directory.getAbsolutePath())) {
395                        for (String excludePattern : fileSet.getExcludes()) {
396                            if (pathMatches(excludePattern, path) || patternEquals(path, excludePattern, directory)) {
397                                matches = false;
398                                if (getLog().isDebugEnabled()) {
399                                    getLog().debug("Path [" + relativePath + "] matched the exclude pattern [" + excludePattern + "] of the directory [" + fileSet.getDirectory() + "]");
400                                }
401                                break;
402                            }
403                        }
404                    }
405                }
406                if (!matches) {
407                    break;
408                }
409            }
410        }
411
412        return matches;
413    }
414
415    private boolean isDefaultExcluded(Path path) {
416        boolean excludeTargetDirectory = true;
417        if (this.watches != null && !this.watches.isEmpty()) {
418            for (FileSet fileSet : this.watches) {
419                if (fileSet.getDirectory().equals(this.targetDirectory.getName())) {
420                    excludeTargetDirectory = false;
421                }
422            }
423        }
424        return (excludeTargetDirectory && path.startsWith(targetDirectory.getAbsolutePath())) ||
425               DEFAULT_EXCLUDES.stream()
426                   .anyMatch(excludePattern -> pathMatches(excludePattern, path));
427    }
428
429    private boolean hasBeenCompiledRecently() {
430        return (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastCompilation) < LAST_COMPILATION_THRESHOLD;
431    }
432
433    private void cleanup() {
434        if (getLog().isDebugEnabled()) {
435            getLog().debug("Cleaning up");
436        }
437        try {
438            directoryWatcher.close();
439            maybeStopTestResourcesServer();
440        } catch (Exception e) {
441            // Do nothing
442        }
443    }
444
445    private boolean rebuildMavenProject() {
446        boolean success = true;
447        try {
448            ProjectBuildingRequest projectBuildingRequest = mavenSession.getProjectBuildingRequest();
449            projectBuildingRequest.setResolveDependencies(true);
450            ProjectBuildingResult build = projectBuilder.build(runnableProject.getArtifact(), projectBuildingRequest);
451            MavenProject project = build.getProject();
452            runnableProject = project;
453            mavenSession.setCurrentProject(project);
454        } catch (ProjectBuildingException e) {
455            success = false;
456            if (getLog().isWarnEnabled()) {
457                getLog().warn("Error while trying to build the Maven project model", e);
458            }
459        }
460        return success;
461    }
462
463    private boolean resolveDependencies() {
464        try {
465            List<Dependency> dependencies = compilerService.resolveDependencies(JavaScopes.PROVIDED, JavaScopes.COMPILE, JavaScopes.RUNTIME);
466            if (dependencies.isEmpty()) {
467                return false;
468            } else {
469                this.classpath = compilerService.buildClasspath(dependencies);
470                return true;
471            }
472        } finally {
473            if (classpath != null) {
474                this.classpathHash = this.classpath.hashCode();
475            }
476        }
477    }
478
479    private boolean classpathHasChanged() {
480        int oldClasspathHash = this.classpathHash;
481        this.classpathHash = this.classpath.hashCode();
482        return oldClasspathHash != classpathHash;
483
484    }
485
486    /**
487     * Runs or restarts the application. Only visible for testing, shouldn't
488     * be called directly.
489     *
490     * @throws Exception if something goes wrong while starting the application
491     */
492    protected void runApplication() throws Exception {
493        if (restartLock.getQueueLength() >= 1) {
494            // if there's more than one restart request, we'll handle them all at once
495            return;
496        }
497        restartLock.lock();
498        try {
499            runAotIfNeeded();
500            String classpathArgument = new File(targetDirectory, "classes" + File.pathSeparator).getAbsolutePath() + this.classpath;
501
502            List<String> args = new ArrayList<>();
503            args.add(javaExecutable);
504
505            if (debug) {
506                String suspend = debugSuspend ? "y" : "n";
507                args.add("-agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=" + suspend + ",address=" + debugHost + ":" + debugPort);
508            }
509
510            if (testResourcesEnabled) {
511                Path testResourcesSettingsDirectory = shared ? ServerUtils.getDefaultSharedSettingsPath(sharedServerNamespace) :
512                    AbstractTestResourcesMojo.serverSettingsDirectoryOf(targetDirectory.toPath());
513                Optional<ServerSettings> serverSettings = ServerUtils.readServerSettings(testResourcesSettingsDirectory);
514                serverSettings.ifPresent(settings -> testResourcesHelper.computeSystemProperties(settings)
515                    .forEach((k, v) -> args.add("-D" + k + "=" + v)));
516            }
517
518            if (jvmArguments != null && !jvmArguments.isEmpty()) {
519                final String[] strings = CommandLineUtils.translateCommandline(jvmArguments);
520                args.addAll(Arrays.asList(strings));
521            }
522
523            if (!mavenSession.getUserProperties().isEmpty()) {
524                mavenSession.getUserProperties().forEach((k, v) -> args.add("-D" + k + "=" + v));
525            }
526
527            args.add("-classpath");
528            args.add(classpathArgument);
529            args.add("-XX:TieredStopAtLevel=1");
530            args.add("-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote");
531            args.add(mainClass);
532
533            if (appArguments != null && !appArguments.isEmpty()) {
534                final String[] strings = CommandLineUtils.translateCommandline(appArguments);
535                args.addAll(Arrays.asList(strings));
536            }
537
538            if (getLog().isDebugEnabled()) {
539                getLog().debug("Running " + String.join(" ", args));
540            }
541
542            killProcess();
543            process = new ProcessBuilder(args)
544                .inheritIO()
545                .directory(targetDirectory)
546                .start();
547        } finally {
548            restartLock.unlock();
549        }
550    }
551
552    private void runAotIfNeeded() {
553        if (aotEnabled) {
554            try {
555                executorService.executeGoal(THIS_PLUGIN, AotAnalysisMojo.NAME);
556            } catch (MojoExecutionException e) {
557                getLog().error(e.getMessage());
558            }
559        }
560    }
561
562    private void maybeStartTestResourcesServer() throws MojoExecutionException {
563        testResourcesHelper.start();
564    }
565
566    private void maybeStopTestResourcesServer() throws MojoExecutionException {
567        testResourcesHelper.stop();
568    }
569
570    private boolean compileProject() {
571        // There can be multiple changes detected at the same time, so we want
572        // to keep only one compilation request
573        if (recompileRequested.get()) {
574            return false;
575        }
576        recompileRequested.set(true);
577        try {
578            return doCompile();
579        } finally {
580            recompileRequested.set(false);
581        }
582    }
583
584    private boolean doCompile() {
585        Optional<Long> lastCompilationMillis = compilerService.compileProject();
586        lastCompilationMillis.ifPresent(lc -> this.lastCompilation = lc);
587        return lastCompilationMillis.isPresent();
588    }
589
590    private void killProcess() {
591        if (process != null && process.isAlive()) {
592            if (getLog().isDebugEnabled()) {
593                getLog().debug("Stopping the background process");
594            }
595            process.destroy();
596            try {
597                process.waitFor();
598            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
599                process.destroyForcibly();
600                Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
601            }
602        }
603    }
604
605    private static String normalize(Path path) {
606        return path.toString().replace('\\', '/');
607    }
608
609    private static boolean pathMatches(String pattern, Path path) {
610        return AbstractScanner.match(pattern, normalize(path));
611    }
612
613    private static boolean patternEquals(Path path, String includePattern, File directory) {
614        try {
615            var testPath = normalize(directory.toPath().resolve(includePattern).toAbsolutePath());
616            return testPath.equals(normalize(path.toAbsolutePath()));
617        } catch (InvalidPathException ex) {
618            return false;
619        }
620    }
621
622}
